mapper.insert: delete from order_classification_report where left(create_time,7)=#{time}; INSERT INTO order_classification_report(orderid,create_time,expressno,buyAmount,salesAmount,avgSalePrice,salesCount,buyCount,actualFreight,estimatedWeight,actualWeight,shippingType,proLossAmount,proLoss) SELECT c.*,c.salesAmount-c.buyAmount-c.actualFreight AS proLossAmount,CAST((c.salesAmount-c.buyAmount-c.actualFreight)/c.salesAmount*100 AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS proLoss FROM ( SELECT oi.order_no,oi.create_time, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sp.expressno),'') AS expressno, CAST(SUM(IFNULL(ops.goods_p_price*ops.buycount,0.00)) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS buyAmount, CAST(SUM(od.goodsprice*od.yourorder*6.3) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS salesAmount, CAST(SUM(od.goodsprice*od.yourorder*6.3)/SUM(od.yourorder) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS avgPrice, SUM(od.yourorder) AS salesCount,SUM(ops.buycount) AS buyCount,IFNULL(s.totalprice,0.00) AS actualFreight, IFNULL(sp.sweight,0.00) AS estimatedWeight,IFNULL(s.realWeight,0.00) AS actualWeight, IF(LENGTH(sp.remarks)>22,'合并出货','正常出货') AS shippingType FROM orderinfo oi INNER JOIN USER u ON oi.user_id=u.id INNER JOIN admin_r_user a ON u.id=a.userid INNER JOIN order_details od ON od.orderid=oi.order_no AND od.state<2 LEFT JOIN shipping_package sp ON sp.orderid=oi.order_no OR LOCATE(sp.remarks,oi.order_no) LEFT JOIN shipment s ON sp.expressno=s.orderNo LEFT JOIN order_product_source ops ON od.orderid=ops.orderid AND od.goodsid=ops.goodsid WHERE a.admName<>'testAdm' AND LEFT(oi.create_time,7)=#{time} AND LENGTH(oi.order_no)<=18 AND oi.state>0 AND oi.state<6 GROUP BY oi.order_no ) c
